name: alocubano-boulderfest
description: A Lo Cubano Boulder Fest - Minimalist Dance Festival Website

scripts.build: NODE_OPTIONS='--max-old-space-size=1024' node -e "import('child_process').then(({execSync}) => { const isVercel = process.env.VERCEL === '1'; const env = process.env.VERCEL_ENV || 'local'; console.log(''); console.log('üî® Build Process'); console.log('================'); console.log('Environment: ' + env); console.log('Platform: ' + (isVercel ? 'Vercel' : 'Local')); console.log(''); console.log('üìö Embedding documentation...'); const startTime = Date.now(); execSync('node scripts/embed-docs.cjs', {stdio:'inherit'}); const embedTime = Date.now() - startTime; console.log('üìö Documentation embedded (' + embedTime + 'ms)'); console.log(''); if(isVercel) { console.log('üóÑÔ∏è  Running database migrations...'); const migrateStart = Date.now(); execSync('npm run migrate:vercel', {stdio:'inherit'}); const migrateTime = Date.now() - migrateStart; console.log('‚úÖ Migrations completed (' + migrateTime + 'ms)'); console.log(''); } console.log('üìã Bootstrapping database...'); const bootstrapStart = Date.now(); execSync('npm run bootstrap', {stdio:'inherit'}); const bootstrapTime = Date.now() - bootstrapStart; console.log('‚úÖ Database bootstrapped (' + bootstrapTime + 'ms)'); if(isVercel) { console.log(''); console.log('üèóÔ∏è  Vercel processing build outputs...'); console.log('‚è≥ This may take 2-3 minutes for Vercel optimization'); console.log('üì¶ Progress: Bundling serverless functions and static assets'); console.log('üîß Progress: Applying Vercel-specific optimizations'); console.log('üöÄ Progress: Preparing deployment package'); } else { console.log(''); console.log('üìã Running structure verification...'); execSync('npm run verify-structure', {stdio:'inherit'}); } console.log(''); console.log('‚úÖ Build script completed - Vercel will continue optimization'); console.log(''); }).catch(console.error);"
scripts.test:all: npm test && npm run test:integration && npm run test:coverage && npm run test:e2e
scripts.lint: npm run lint:js && npm run lint:html && npm run lint:markdown
scripts.migrate:down: echo '‚ö†Ô∏è  Warning: SQLite migration rollback not implemented. Manual database restoration required.' && echo 'Current migration system does not support automated rollback due to SQLite DDL limitations.' && exit 1
